```{r,echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
gapminder <- gapminder
```

```{r}
perm_mean <- function(perms, values, n1)
{
## step one
  result <- vector("numeric", perms)
  
  # Loop throught number of permutations
  for (i in 1:perms)
  {
    x <- sample(1:length(values), n1)
  
  group1 <- values[x]
  group2 <- values[-x]

  diff <- mean(group1)-mean(group2)
  result[i] <- diff
    # Step 4:

  }
  # Step 5:
 result <- as.tibble(result)
 print(result)
  }

test1 <- perm_mean(1000,c(1:100),50)

ggplot(data = test1, mapping = aes(x= value))+
  geom_density()

```

```{r}
perm_cor <- function(perms,x,y){
  result <- vector("numeric",perms)

for( i in c(1:perms))
{
  y <- sample(y,length(y))
  c <- cor(x,y)
  result[i] <- c
}
result <- as.tibble(result)
print(result)
}
perm_cor(100,c(1:10),c(1:10))

```
